operations.notes: Will return either UI_STATUS_NORMAL  or UI_STATUS_NOT_INSTALLED.
Allows updating of users details. Any one or more of the fields in the request object can be specified

errorResponses.reason: If any of the specified parameters fails validation. Check response body for details.

operations.notes: Returns result as a map device name => device type. Requires admin privileges

operations.summary: Search for user by mobile number
operations.notes: This is intended to be used by  services that want to find who this mobile number belongs to. Will also search contacts. In the case of contacts, will return the user to whom that contact belongs. Requires admin privileges.

operations.summary: Returns status for hub and all its devices
operations.notes: Returns result as a map device id => device information. Requires admin privileges
operations.responseClass:
{
" hub": {
" uptime" : "integer",
" connection" : "string",
" configuring" : "string",
" configUpdateTime" : "string",
" version" : "string",
" latestVersion" : "string"
},
" device-id" : {
" type" : "string",
" battery" : "double",
" batteryLow" : "boolean",
" batteryLevel" : "integer",
" batteryPercentage" : "integer",
" mains" : "boolean",
" power" : "string",
" signal" : "integer",
" presence" : "boolean",
" temperature" : "double",
" version" : "string",
" latestVersion" : "string",
" upgrade" : "string",
" reason" : "string",
" hardwareRevision" : "string"
}
}

operations.notes: Retrieves a specific detail. Will return null for invalid settings

hubIds.description: List of Hub id's that belong to the user

userId.description: Id of the logged in user

tandcConfirmed.description: Whether the user has confirmed terms and conditions
